sen.j: 京都写真家協会（きょうとしゃしんかきょうかい、略称KPS）は京都府のプロ写真家の組織で、1970年（昭和45年）に設立。
sen.e: Kyoto Photographers Society (KPS) is an organization for professional photographers in Kyoto Prefecture, and founded in 1970.
sen.cmt: 年号をウェブから補いました。
sen.e: The Kyoto Photographers' Society (KPS), an organization for professional photographers in Kyoto Prefecture, was founded in 1970.
The Kyoto Photographers' Society (KPS), an organization for professional photographers in Kyoto Prefecture, was founded in 1970.

sen.j: 発起人代表者は小西晴美・中島良太郎・村田奎太郎・山本建三。
sen.e: Founders and representatives are Harumi KONISHI, Ryotaro NAKAJIMA, Keitaro MURATA, and Kenzo YAMAMOTO.
The founders and representatives were Harumi KONISHI, Ryotaro NAKAJIMA, Keitaro MURATA and Kenzo YAMAMOTO.
The founders and representatives were Harumi KONISHI, Ryotaro NAKAJIMA, Keitaro MURATA and Kenzo YAMAMOTO.

sen.j: 現在の会長は木村尚達。
sen.e: The current president is Shotatsu KIMURA.
The current president is Shotatsu KIMURA.
The current president is Shotatsu KIMURA.
History
History
History

sen.j: - 京都広告写真家協会発足
sen.e: Kyoto Advertising Photographers Society was formed.
The Kyoto Advertising Photographers' Society was formed.
The Kyoto Advertising Photographers' Society was formed.
It was renamed as Kyoto Photographic Society.
It was renamed as the Kyoto Photographic Society.
It was renamed as the Kyoto Photographic Society.

sen.j: - 創立25周年をもって、京都写真家協会に改称
sen.e: On the 25th anniversary of its founding, it was renamed as Kyoto Photographers Society.
On the twenty-fifth anniversary of its founding, it was renamed as the Kyoto Photographers' Society.
On the twenty-fifth anniversary of its founding, it was renamed as the Kyoto Photographers' Society.

sen.j: 京都写真家協会展（京都府立文化芸術会館）
sen.e: Kyoto Photographers Society Exhibition (Kyoto Prefectural Center for Arts and Culture)
The Kyoto Photographers' Society Exhibition (Kyoto Prefectural Center for Arts and Culture)
The Kyoto Photographers' Society Exhibition (Kyoto Prefectural Center for Arts and Culture)
